subject: More predictive.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I don't know if I should post this stuff or not, given some people's
extreme reactions. They act like I'm producing this stuff my self. since I'm
not one to "know better", I don't thihk it ethical to withhold certain
voices. People that don't like it can bite me!

At just after 3 seconds "..it is over in March", and who out there in
brainiac land can base their "knowing better" on anything but fear?

 Ya have to keep in mind, I have gotten these dates since day one ogf baxes
as well, just as somke Christian scholar has produced the exact enddate,
repeatedly over the last two thousand years. That's why I don't hold my
breath waiting for the end of the world. Yeah, all the ear  marks of a cult,
believe what you want, try to stay naked, and do your own recordings, not
taking them as gospel. How these dumb f---s out here make that into a cult I
have no idea.

 Oh yeah, and uneducated does not mean stupid! It means not indoctrinated,
which is a big help to free thinking.

f-s
